content.title: Batch Compression Benefits
content.text: Processing images one by one is time-consuming and inefficient. Batch compression allows you to compress up to 100 images simultaneously, saving hours of work and ensuring consistent results across your entire image collection. Whether you're optimizing a photo gallery, preparing images for a website, or compressing files for storage, batch processing handles everything in one operation. Our browser-based batch compressor processes all images locally using Canvas API, ensuring complete privacy while providing fast, efficient compression without uploading your images to any server.

content.title: When to Use Batch Compression
content.text: Use batch compression when you need to optimize entire photo galleries or image collections, prepare multiple images for website uploads or social media, compress files for storage or backup purposes, or process images with consistent compression settings. Our tool supports JPG, PNG, WebP, and BMP formats, allowing you to mix different formats in a single batch operation, making it perfect for handling diverse image collections efficiently.

faq.q: How many images can I compress at once?
faq.a: Toolaze supports batch compression of up to 100 images per session. You can process entire photo collections in one operation.

faq.q: Can I mix different image formats in one batch?
faq.a: Yes, you can mix JPG, PNG, WebP, and BMP formats in a single batch. Each image will be compressed while maintaining its original format.

faq.q: Will all images be compressed to the same size?
faq.a: All images will be compressed to meet the same target size you specify (in KB or MB), ensuring consistent results across your batch.

faq.q: Is batch compression free and secure?
faq.a: Yes, Toolaze is completely free forever with no hidden costs. All compression happens locally in your browser. Your images never leave your device‚Äîensuring 100% privacy and security.

faq.q: Can I download all compressed images at once?
faq.a: Yes, you can download all compressed images as a ZIP file or download them individually, whichever is more convenient for you.

faq.q: What file sizes can I compress?
faq.a: There are no individual file size limits. If your computer can open the file, Toolaze can compress it. You can process files of any size in your batch.
